title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Deadly Estate
overview: When Hailey helps her friend Pam sell her recently deceased parentâ€™s estate, she becomes suspicious when Pam suddenly leaves town without notice. To make matters worse, Pam's boyfriend is the sudden victim of an accident and the man Hailey's dating, Assistant Medical Examiner Dr. Jonas McClellan, falls critically ill. Now Hailey must determine: Are all these events a coincidence?
